name: Fish Hero
description: A physics, parkour adventure! Launch yourself up a collection of biomes to reach the summit. Compete against friends by pushing them off platforms to throw them off course. Explore a unique world as a fish out of water.

name: Shy Girl's Makeover
description: College students Kenta and Ayaka are united in their love for video games – and in their feelings for each other. Will their relationship progress beyond being two close gaming friends or will Ayaka’s heart be charmed by someone else? Find out in this slice of life RPG set in modern Japan!

name: HU-man Dungeons
description: The world's finest HU-man simulator! Explore dungeons, slash enemies, collect loot, fight bosses, just like HU-man used to do in their daily lives. Now with a direct uplink to the Compendium for real-time updates!

name: GreenColdBody
description: You will play as a video blogger, surrounded by some kind of terrifying force, still striving to express the Love in your heart. This game can only be played up to 2.5 times.

name: Apartment No 129
description: Emir, who has an interest in mysterious events, steps alone into the abandoned apartment known as "Apartment No 129" to trace the trail of a paranormal event that occurred in 2009 and shook the country. However, he will find himself in an unexpected confrontation within this cursed apartment.

name: Five Likes Please: Historic Weapons Pack
description: A pack that includes new weapons, mainly from WW1 and WW2. Each DLC weapon is derived from a base weapon with set attachments and other minor tweaks. The DLC weapons can be equipped even if the base weapon is not unlocked yet, but their attachments cannot be customized.

name: Five Likes Please: Neon Pack
description: A pack that includes new futuristic-themed weapons that operate on heat rather than reloading. This pack also includes more reticules, reticule colors, weapon camos, and the ability to change any base weapon's tracer/muzzle flash color.

name: Five Likes Please
description: Five Likes Please is a fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Build your arsenal by obtaining new weapons and buying attachments. Obtain "likes" and buy powerful streaks, such as vehicles and power weapons. We know this game is bad, so as long as we can at least get five likes, that would be great.

name: Sporti's Universe
description: Sporti's Universe is an innovative exergame designed to address the challenge of getting school-aged children to engage in physical activity in today's digital age. It leverages technology to encourage physical movement while providing an engaging and enjoyable gaming experience.

name: My Last Appointment
description: The doctor said today was my last appointment, I'm healthy. Time to go home, what could go wrong?

name: Desert Island in Summer?
description: Hikaru sets off for a fun-filled summer vacation at his university's club retreat. However, a sudden fierce storm blows in, causing their boat to drift off course, leading to them being stranded. Will Hikaru be able to make a girlfriend before they manage to escape this predicament?

name: World of Goo 2
description: Use living liquid creatures to build bridges, grow towers, terraform terrain, and fuel flying machines. The world is beautiful, dangerous, and evolving.

name: House Party: New Content Pack
description: Expand the party with fresh clothing items, a short new storyline, and two new characters from the minds of the Eek! Games team. New clothes will be wearable on all NPCs, you can enjoy a themed side-story separate from the Original Story, and one male and one new female NPC will join the party!

name: Zero Below the Sun
description: Classic survival horror reimagined with a retro look and modern feel, set in a top secret underground research facility in Antarctica.

name: Mossroot
description: Mossroot is a party-based tactical-RPG Roguelike. Climb a fortified mountain. Fight Monsters and villains! Power up your team's stats, make difficult decisions Recruit enemies to help fight against tyranny. Bring them to your Homebase, Build it to gain more power, or make runs harder for rewards!

name: Real Web Legends: Carter's Quest
description: Fight, solve puzzles, and learn the secrets of Homunculi in this character-action RPG experience. Create and customize your own Homunculus, develop new techniques and combos with an array of weapons, and fight to end a centuries-long conflict.

name: Closer the Distance
description: Closer the Distance is a slice-of-life sim that tells a deeply emotional story about the connections between family and friends in the face of tragedy. Unearth long kept secrets, repair strained relationships, and help your loved ones move on.

name: The Battle of Sacred Heart
description: The Battle of Sacred Heart is a refreshing action RPG. Sacred Heart nuns challenge the elite of the four armies of Middle Earth. What the player must face is a protracted battle to the death.

name: Attack on Hex Island
description: A cute and approachable turn-based deck builder/card battler that combines the battle systems from Tetra Master/Triple Triad and Pokémon. Collect, upgrade, and customize your party to strategically defeat your opponents and save them from the attack on Hex Island.

name: Insomnia
description: A 3D "Survive the night" Horror Game played through the perspective of a father who wants to free his daughter from a powerful demon.

name: Death Nomad
description: Death nomad is a zombie survival game with procedurally generated environments. The environment will force you to improve your equipment, defense and constantly move around the world, prolonging your chances of survive.

name: Motordoom
description: Motördoom is a freestyle-sports-shooter that combines high octane, visceral combat with fluid movement and trick mechanics. Perform gnarly tricks while defeating grotesque monsters and upgrade your character with demonic offerings to become ever more powerful.

name: Calamity Sanctuary
description: Calamity Sanctuary is a roguelite action rpg with deckbuilding elements. Build your deck, acquire powerful daemons and fight your way in realtime for a chance get to safety before the prophesied Calamity strikes.

name: Sock It
description: Sock It is a wacky, completely unhinged comedy boxing game with platforming and cutscenes. Box more than 12 crazy bosses! Platforming stages to break up the action! Cutscenes that guarantee 1 giggle (Usually around 5 hearty laughs)!

name: ForkJump
description: A platformer exploration game. Play with the strange innovative gameplay mechanisms. Set in a mysterious fantasy world of caves, nature and built structures. Collect the keys to proceed and find the legendary treasure.

name: Roundscape Adorevia
description: Roundscape Adorevia is a turn-based 2D adult RPG filled with extensive content, exotic companions, and dozens of story choices. Select your gender, origin, class, and companions to explore the lewd fantasy world of Adorevia.

name: Seaside Racing
description: Seaside Racing is a racing game available through the Xbox Live Indie Games service on Xbox 360.

name: UBoat
description: UBOAT is a simulator of a submarine from WWII era. It is a survival sandbox with crew management mechanics while its primary theme is life of German sailors. The boat is their home, but it can become their grave at any time.

name: 2nd Obakeidoro! Fest Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood Night
description: A puzzle roguelike that features strategic battles utilizing chess movement rules.

name: Retribution: 25th Anniversary Edition
description:
Anniversary Edition of Half-Life: Retribution mod includes Half-Life 25th Anniversary Update's new features:

- Removed non-working multiplayer and everything connected with it.
- All types of debris have been completely removed.
- New menu background up to Quad HD resolution as "WON" version
- Animated Logo
- New loading screen
- UI items click sound as "WON" version
- Added 4 options in game configuratons "Advanced"
- Removed unsupported menu items
- Added new menu item for demo campain
- New icons for Steam library
- include russian translation.

name: Weapons of War
description: Weapons of War is a free 3D fantasy MMORPG set in an ancient mythical world, featuring five classes, quests, PvP and PvE environments, and ongoing in-game events

name: Superball Mario: Neutral Special
description: This mod replaces Mario's fireball with the superball from Super Mario Land. The new projectile is capable of bouncing off of floors, walls, and ceilings in order to reach places and fighters that Mario would otherwise be unable to reach.

name: Brawl Stars: Paint Brawl!
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Sonic Battle
description: Full fledged Sonic Fighting game - Super Sonic Battle. Developed to celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the GBA title Sonic Battle!

name: Apex Heroines: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Blockdude
description: Blockdude is a remake of the well known TI Caluculator game from Brandon Sterner as well as the blockman game from Soleau Software. This version of the game for the vircon32 fantasy console is based on the Playdate port which was in itself a port of the GP2X port of blockdude made over a decade ago.

name: Hoonigans
description:
Hoonigans is a top-down racing game which pays homage to the classic retro racers of yesteryear. The aim of the game is simple: prove your worth as you tackle the game's diverse array of tracks and challenges, and earn medals to unlock a host of characters, tracks, vehicles, and more!

The game comprises twelve challenging tracks, three playable characters, and a huge array of vehicles.

name: Aether Diving
description:
"The Aether Diving program aims to perceive energy levels in the body and help get rid of imperfections. These imperfections get in the way of a healthy lifestyle. Pairing the latest in technology and relentless study of the Divine Scriptures, we have kept our followers’ faults and defects at bay. Join us now, diving deep into consciousness and freeing the mind from torment. Enlightment awaits."
-High Priest Maxime

name: Pets
description: The gaming universe "Pets" is already waiting for you - new active players! Our game is created for all animal lovers and, of course, for those who already have their own favorite pets! Just click and get various pets into your inventory - from cats and dogs to turtles and hamsters!

name: Coconut
description: Idle clicker with periodic free skin rolls that can be used in-game and traded.

name: Locked Room on Rails
description: A Murder Mystery visual novel starring homicide detective Santiago Moore, as he tries to solve a sudden murder on the luxurious Jacob's Ladder Express Train.

name: Mad Devils: Damned-finitive Edition
description: Mad Devils is a co-op, arcade shooter set in a twisted WWII setting. What does an Allied special forces squad who hunt Nazi occultist do when betrayed, killed and resurrected as demons? Their job.

name: Hat Kid Steals the Declaration of Independence 3: Kingslayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Dokapon! Ikari no Tekken
description: This title is a remastered version of the RPG-like board game of the same name that was originally released for the PlayStation in 1998. Players can enjoy anything and everything, from fighting monsters to defeating friends, in order to become the richest man on the board, which is a prerequisite for winning the game.

name: Temple Run: Legends
description:
Temple Run: Legends is the first level-based runner within the Temple Run family and features all-new gameplay modes, challenges, and rewards.

Run, swim, and hop on crocodile heads while crossing rivers to achieve a 3-star rating on hundreds of levels. Explore and conquer the saga map and learn the secrets of the world of Aperion. Experience the different climates, inhabitants and challenges of this new land as you run from level to level with a wide cast of characters!

name: Shattered Palace
description: In your journey to find a way back to Parthoris, you've come across a desolate palace. In hopes of finding a way out, you step through the portal at the entrance.

name: Nostalgic Entropy: Neo Retro
description: Welcome to the Neon Circles of Hell! Nostalgic Entropy: Neo-Retro is a large non-linear Vaporwave map where the architecture twists and turns into familiar structures of a future that wasn't meant to be. Experience a variety of combat scenarios, from classic coincidental encounters to gimmicky mini-game-like ones.

name: Whale Well
description: Whale Well is a short adventure game where you play as a duck. Collect and trade items while exploring a civilization in the belly of a great whale.

name: Homerun Clash 2: Legends Derby
description:
As the sequel to "Homerun Clash," the casual baseball game centered around home run derbies and downloaded 12 million times, "Homerun Clash 2" boasts a rich and diverse range of content, which includes features such as ranking systems that rank players from around the world, 1vs1 Match, 2vs2 Match, the Challenge Derby where the player must play against a pitching machine, and more.

The game also features legendary batters from four different countries where baseball is a popular sport as in-game characters: "Dae-ho Lee" from South Korea, "Albert Pujols" from the United States of America, "Michihiro Ogasawara" from Japan, and "Tai-shan Chang" from Taiwan. Not only do these baseball legends appear as in-game characters, but they are also featured in the story-driven "World Star" content, which has been designed to enhance the gameplay. Already people are quite interested in seeing home run derby matches being played featuring the legendary batters.

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991: Play for Israel
description: DLS makes it possible to play for Israel

name: PowerWash Simulator: Muckingham Files - Part 4
description: Cool off with sudsy, high-pressured water this summer in PowerWash Simulator's latest Seasonal Special. Take a vacation from Muckingham's mainland to clean up the sun deck of Crab Bay's cruise liner following a messy departure.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Million Dollar Kitty"
description: That Million Dollar costume is new for Yohane!

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Modern Yukata Set: Vermilion
description: Sin descripción

name: Ein's Sword 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled: Gisele Level Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled: Bianca Level Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled: BackySoftie Level Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled: Ariadne Level Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Stars: Sport Climbing
description: Climb the wall&reach for the top! Join adorable characters on an adventure to reach the highest heights. Play 1P or with up to 4P in innovative&fun climbing game!

name: Road to Valhalla
description: Are you ready for the feats ?

name: Sugoi Girls: Exotic Egypt
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Wiper
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: The Final Round
description:
"THE FINAL ROUND" is a sports-action game released by KONAMI in 1988.
Train to become a boxing champion and win matches against your rivals.
If they hit you, hit them back! Hard Punchers covered in blood, win the hot fights and grab the glory!

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation

name: PowerWash Simulator: Cruise Ship Sun Deck - Summer 2024
description: Cool off with sudsy, high-pressured water this summer in PowerWash Simulator’s latest Seasonal Special. Take a vacation from Muckingham’s mainland to clean up the sun deck of Crab Bay’s cruise liner following a messy departure.

name: Solaris Strike
description: Planetary Conflict: 2301 is sci-fi multiplayer third person shooter set in the future, in a war between the Lunar Federation and Planetary Union.

name: Hololive Treasure Mountain
description: Stack the Love of Captain Marin! A Simple yet Exciting 3D Physics Puzzle Game!

name: Five Fold Tower
description: "Five Towers" is a Roguelike game, where the main gameplay is to fight monsters in the overhead corner. There are over 100 types of magic weapons and talents in the game, and there are various types of monsters in the tower, as well as multiple bosses for players to challenge.

name: Medieval Nightt: Part 1
description: Medieval Nightt is a first-person horror game where, as a young adventurer, you explore an ancient medieval empire in ruins, facing restless spirits and paranormal creatures while unraveling the dark secrets of a lost civilization.

name: The Curiosity
description: The protagonist Ken and his friend Jun have come to a certain mountain to visit a rumored ruin. What awaits them there is...

name: Dungeon Board
description: Dungeon Board is a virtual tabletop and companion app that puts you in control. Author your encounters and play them out with friends over Steam Remote Play Together or video sharing.

name: Chroma
description: Blast through an army of robots and take down their oppressive corporate empire. Master fast paced movement abilities, combine colors for explosive builds, and make every shot count to beat this back-breaking roguelike shooter.

name: Bussy Master: Club Leather
description: Dive into Bussy Master: Club LEATHER! Solve puzzles in a steamy gay BDSM nightclub filled with sexy men in tight leather. Discover 86 alluring leather-clad men, explore a sensual gallery, and enjoy an immersive 5K visual experience with a captivating soundtrack.

name: Real Car Drift Racing
description: Race and drift to gain useful points to unlock and customize more than 100 vehicles! Drive freely around a huge open-world environment inspired by Old Wild stories. Explore and have fun driving your own way!

name: Memoria VR
description: Memoria utilizes virtual reality to immerse healthy individuals in the experience of dementia symptoms, aiming to foster empathy and awareness regarding the challenges faced by people living with dementia.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Tropical Treats
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Tropical Beach themed tables with unique one-way borders!

name: Project Stack
description: Project Stack, a simple and relaxing game where your main goal is to collect and sell fruit to meet your quota. As you earn money, you can upgrade your small island to expand it. Acquire tools and upgrades to help you collect even more fruit, with some rare fruits having unique properties.

name: Gem Blast
description: Mine gems on an infinite hex board. Play as a cute robot stranded on an alien planet. Find ship parts to repair your broken space ship. Use markers and logic to find gems and avoid bombs. Skillful play lets you dig longer. Spend gems to upgrade Dig Bot. Unlock achievements for even more power!

name: Dark Hunter
description: 《Dark Hunter》 is an easy-to-play Roguelike dungeon exploration game. You will lead a team to defeat enemies in the dungeon. You can switch characters at any time during combat, and with random buffs, each exploration promises a unique gaming experience.

name: Box Zombies
description: Grab some friends and explore randomly-generated maps as you use weapons & power-ups to beat off massive zombie hordes. Cooperation is encouraged, but be careful of stray bullets and bouncing grenades!

name: Devil In My House
description: Shortly after Lucas leaves, he learns that his wife Ashley is missing. After receiving this information, he returns home to investigate and find out what happened at home.

name: Mech Survivor Elite
description: Mech Survivor Elite is a time-based survival game featuring action-packed gameplay and roguelite elements.

name: Slide Treasures: Lydia's Hunt
description: Set sail to discover treasures and mysteries in an engaging and intriguing story in this casual puzzler.

name: Wanted
description: Wanted - this is a leisure game about REVENGE! You can unleash your inner fury and make those annoying people pay the price. Are you ready?

name: Cats-Shaped
description: Cats-Shape is a clicker game, in which you click on a cat shape!Earn random cat shapes to grow your collection!Come hang out with us and let's become the kings of cat shapes!

name: Final Night
description: A nightmarish descent into your worst memories awaits. In "Final Night," you're forced to relive your darkest traumas - now twisted into monstrous, living horrors that hunt you relentlessly. Every shadow hides a piece of your broken past, eager to drag you into the abyss.

name: Stellar Return
description: Can you make the right choices and unravel the secrets of this alien world.Your cosmic adventure awaits! Embark on a unique space adventure.You take on the critical role of a remote mission controller. Your task? Guide a stranded astronaut who has crash-landed on a mysterious alien planet.

name: Run, Vivian Run
description: Vivian starts running to change her fate――― A simple and rhythmic 2D side-scrolling action game. Match the correct actions to the music as you race through a collapsing fantasy world. Currently, only Stage 1 is available in this early access version.

name: Light: Die to Survive
description: Explore a haunted house, shadowy forests, and ominous roads with a flashlight in "Light - Die to Survive," a spine-chilling horror game. Solve random, terrifying paranormal mysteries in a night-shrouded environment. Experience dynamic horror, immersive sound effects, and mystery solving. Can you escape the darkness?

name: Same Break Game
description:
Operation Deep Sea Creature Capture.
A puzzle game you keep catching the same character next to each other.

name: Super Kawaii! Finding Mistakes in Panda Photos
description:
Find mistakes in cute panda pictures!
Enjoy brain training while being healed by pandas!

name: Synaxarion Christian Stories: Holy Martyr Savvas the Goth
description: Born in 334, Savvas the Goth underwent fierce persecution as a Christian. This is his story.

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference with Animal Kids Photos
description: Enjoy Brain Training with Adorable Baby Animals from Kittens and Puppies to Penguins and Seals!

name: Treasure Hunt on a World Trip
description: Let’s find the hidden secret items in the photos of World Heritage sites!

name: Untitled Goose Game & Thank Goodness You're Here! Bundle
description:
Two passingly similar, yet very different games about causing hilarious chaos in small British towns.
Untitled Goose Game
It's a lovely morning in the village and you are a horrible goose.

Thank Goodness You're Here!
Thank Goodness You're Here! is an absurd comedy slapformer set in the bizarre Northern English town of Barnsworth. As a traveling salesman, take the time to see the sights and meet the locals, who are very eager to give you a series of increasingly odd jobs…

name: Find The Cat
description:
Find one different cat among many cats!
A brain training game that exercises your blink of an eye by finding cats!

name: A Night With: Bartender
description: Spend a night with Ivy, a charismatic and skilled bartender, and navigate through an evolving relationship.

name: Last Day to Die
description: The game offers intense survival gameplay where you and your friends must battle zombies by night and fend off bandits by day in a post-apocalyptic world. Work together to survive!

name: The Tree of Immortality
description: Awaken as a humble farmer, lost and bewildered in a dense dark forest, before a giant tree. within the darkness are sinister spirit beasts that emerge from the shadows, threatening your survival. Battle these monsters, gain experience, explore and grow stronger before the next wave starts.

name: Town Rhapsody
description: In the "Town Rhapsody", players play the role of a struggling young man who, through unremitting efforts and high emotional intelligence, is promoted and paid a raise. More importantly, they share beautiful memories with the girls in the town.

name: Merge
description: Merge is a minimalistic and easy to understand puzzle game... The goal is simple; Merge...

name: GymBro
description: GymBro – is a clicker game that immerses you in the world of sports and lets you click a kettlebell! Quickly join our community, play the mini-game where the main object is a kettlebell, change its appearance through the inventory, and earn rewards... Of course, in the form of kettlebell skins!

name: Inertial Craft
description: "Inertial Craft" is a simple-to-operate racing game in a cyber world. You can experience a thrilling race with the strong and inertial behavior unique to a craft floating off the ground. Enjoy unique behavior and UI for each craft.

name: The Test Game
description: Escape from an abandoned island by collecting points, food, and resources. Fight to survive. Discover the underwater world and get the best high score to unlock various in game achievements. The Test Game, my first game ever!

name: Too Angry To Die
description: Take control of Gideon Rageblade in this action-filled clicker game. Click to destroy endless waves of enemies, face epic bosses, and earn unique drops. Embrace the rage and irony in a quest that proves dying once was just a fluke—he's too angry to die again.

name: Keyboard Souls
description: Oh my friend, are you one of the strongest typists in the world? Come and try this typing rouge shooting game, practice and become more stronger. Finally you will prove yourself.

name: Cosplay Crisis: Succubus Invasion
description: Cosplay Crisis is an Action roguelite bullet heaven with an animecon theme. A Succubus, intent on winning the Convention's cosplay competition, charms the men in attendance to destroy her competition. Now the girls must take up arms to protect their costumes, or be stripped and sent home blushing!

name: Morimens
description: Morimens is a roguelite card-building game inspired by the Cthulhu mythos, where you craft a versatile and intricate deck tailored to your playstyle. The choice is yours to embark on a climb up treacherous towers or engage in tactical battles. Explore misty maps and uncover the truth of the world.

name: Pleasure Sweet Secret
description: A puzzle game, reflexes, and memory to sell crepes and sweets with an erotic theme. The game features iconic characters who will visit your shop and place orders. You must get the ingredients right for the order before the time runs out and the customers leave.

name: Poetry Pigeon
description: Fly frantically between fast-approaching obstacles by typing classic poems! Put your skills of both typing and timing to the test in this new spin on an old favorite! Prefer to fly casual? Try relaxed mode instead and take in the beauty of balladry!

name: Footprints Combination
description: An action puzzle game in which you have to pile up footprints to make them bigger. Aim for a high score so that you don't fall off the platform.

name: Fable Grove
description: Experience the addictive joy of a chilled, pixel clicker game where capturing different monsters in varied weather feels as fun as popping bubble wrap. Level up by clicking monsters or passively over time, increasing your chance to encounter rare Shinys that reward you with Steam Marketplace items.

name: Lootbawx
description: Collect and trade unique items by opening a LOOTBAWX! You'll be occasionally awarded loot boxes that are free to open; new loot boxes will be released frequently and sometimes even by our own community. Join our discord where you can contribute and have some fun.

name: Survival in Draconia
description: Survival in Draconia is a femdom 2D Fantasy RPG set in a continent where dominant women reign supreme. Navigate a harsh landscape, manage your resources, and find your place in a society where survival is anything but guaranteed.

name: Broken War
description: Broken War is an intense first-person shooter that combines different multiplayer modes.

name: Toy Car Extreme Racing: RC Driver Simulator
description: Arcade racing with RC toy cars along exciting tracks with friends! A born racer will not remain indifferent!

name: Zumba Marble Blast
description:
An Exciting Color-Matching Adventure!
Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba Marble Blast.

name: Werewolf Goldfish
description:
Which goldfish is the Werewolf?
Find and scoop up the Werewolf Goldfish hiding in plain sight!

name: E-Tech Simulator
description: Welcome to E-TECH Simulator, the ultimate simulation game where your entrepreneurial skills will be put to the test!

name: Boku no Komayama wo Mamotte
description: Finally, a tower defense game from popular distributor Kiri Komayama is now available! Join Kiri Komayama, a V-streamer with fox-eared glasses, and protect the observatory from the cat-shaped enemy [NEKO]!

name: Japanese House Exploration
description: 『Japanese House Exploration』is a first-person puzzle horror adventure game set in a traditional Japanese house. You explore a house that is both eerie and nostalgic. To find a dear friend.

name: A Wish Star
description: Sin descripción

name: Visiting Battleship Island: A Photographer's Chronicle
description: "A walking simulator of Battleship Island before its collapse. A complete recreation of Battleship Island from a time that no longer exists. Explore freely, as if you've time-traveled back to those days. Would you like to take a stroll to this special place filled with nostalgia?"

name: Virtual Firearm Simulations
description: Virtual Firearm Simulations is a low-poly gun building simulator with over 40 accurately modeled weapons.

name: Stick Tournament
description: Stick Tournament is a Multiplayer 2D-Platformer, where you can compete against your friends in different levels.

name: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter
description:
Experience the legendary Bounty Hunter fantasy set before the events of Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones. Face off against foes and maneuver through acrobatic battles in this adaption optimized for today's consoles and hardware.

Fight your way through the galaxy’s underbelly, equipped with Dual Blasters, your Flamethrower, Whipcord, and pure Mandalorian Rage.

name: You Want to Watch the World Burn
description: YWTWTWB is a fast-paced puzzle in which you are an arsonist burning locations and landmarks to the ground. Balance risk versus reward with the amount of havoc you can cause while staying alive!

name: GalaxIverse II
description: Brace yourself for explosive space battles in GalaxIverse II! This intense multi-directional shooter puts you in the pilot's seat against alien fleets and colossal capital ships.

name: Omusubi
description: One day, Hinako, a high school student, finds her path to school transformed into the Sanzu River, where she meets a strange-looking man named Issa. Will she be able to get through the mysterious devices of the mysterious mansion and return safely to her family?

name: The Crusade Is Nigh
description: The Crusade is Nigh Or TCIN is a game consisting of rpg, rts, and tower defense elements where you fight to control up to 5 lanes while trying to keep your base alive from enemy attacks using strategy & skill

name: Nine Treasures of Liuyin
description: This is a dark, soul like role-playing game, trying to create a different experience in this genre. The protagonist fights against a powerful enemy in this city in search of a divine artifact.

name: S.T.A.R.W.I.E.L.D.
description: S.T.A.R.W.I.E.L.D. is finally here! Embark on an exhilarating space journey where you'll explore the surface of a mysterious planet on a motorcycle, complete thrilling missions, and battle formidable foes!

name: Doom Roller
description: Doom Roller is a fast paced physics arcade game. Guide the ball through the level avoiding obstacles and the dreaded Orbs of Doom! Collect all the gems within time to proceed to the next level. There's an evil twist though... every time you collect a gem your time decreases by five seconds!

name: Darkly Darkness
description: Darkly Darkness is a simple 2D action platformer where you jump and shoot, destroying carefully crafted enemies along the way using pistols, shotguns, and more. It is about a boy trying to discover what has happened to our planet recently. Is it aliens? Something else? He needs to find out.

name: Master of Fried Rice
description: Fried rice————Wok stir-frying————Rice dynamism realized by physics calculation! Complete the best fried rice by using various ingredients!

name: Snowsquall Grip
description: Escape the snowy nightmare or be trapped forever — your call.

name: Hentai Girls: The Princesses
description: A godsend for fans of hentai and NSFW puzzles! AAA-quality nudity pictures (anime style), visual novel elements, arousing female moans, beautiful design with animation, relaxing music, gallery, zoom, cheat and achievements.

name: Let's Café
description: Let's Café is a cafe business simulator game with a quirky and cozy atmosphere. Manage your menu as you experiment and discover new recipes, keep your ingredient budget balanced while shopping to soup up your store, cook quickly and creatively, and serve up smiles to an array of characters!

name: Cubed and Dangerous
description: Cubed and Dangerous is a charming stylized twin-stick shooter that seamlessly merges action roguelike mechanics and action RPG mechanics into an exciting run-based experience.

name: Ranch Mayhem
description: Ranch Mayhem is an active idle game. Explore 15 crops, face invasions, and spend them for bonuses. Enjoy the changing seasons and the farming adventure at your own pace.

name: Shark Siege
description: Survive the siege and keep your vessel afloat in "Shark Siege", where the deep blue sea is your adversary, and courage is your strongest ally. Join the voyage, if you dare!

name: UFO Taxi
description: Explore the City and what's under it, Complete traditional taxi missions or Special side missions for citizens in this 2.5d hovering platformer game.

name: MyPopgoes
description:
Popgoes is an official Five Nights at Freddy's spinoff series, produced by Scott Cawthon and developed by fans as part of the "Fazbear Fanverse Initiative".

MyPopgoes is a short and simple resource management minigame, where you take care of an extremely needy weasel named Popgoes. Housed in an adorable plastic LCD toy, your new pixelated best friend will need pizza, fizzy drinks, and only the best entertainment provided by Freddy Fazbear himself. And if Popgoes doesn't receive what he desperately needs, he passes out. Or maybe he straight up dies. Up to your imagination.

name: Brownie's Adventure 2
description: Get ready for a more exciting and polished expedition into the world of Brownie's Adventure! Filled with genuine hilarity, clever puzzles and exciting adventure. Journey through a vibrant and complex fantasy world, oh and South Yorkshire as well.

name: Blacklist Mafia
description: Blacklist Mafia - is not only a struggle for power and money, but also a dangerous game of survival. Who will be blacklisted, and who will become the new boss? Find out with us!

name: Sublimity
description: As the girl Chloe, you have fallen into the backrooms and are exploring the surroundings, while hiding from scary creatures. Try to survive long enough to maybe find a way out...

name: Invaders Tower Defense Online
description: Build your ultimate defense with a combination of powerful towers. Attack your opponent with strong Invaders. This game is sure to offer a unique and immersive experience for all tower defense enthusiasts!

name: Gravity
description: Embark on a captivating journey with "Gravity," a thrilling puzzle game challenging your problem-solving skills across 100 levels. Unlike a mundane physics lesson, this game injects excitement and fun into the world of puzzles.

name: Hiraeth
description: HIRAETH is a game about mind-bending puzzles and unique platforming challenges, all with stunning graphics and physics-defying mechanics. The overarching plot is a puzzle as in of itself, and the ever-present music elevates the game's dreamy atmosphere.

name: Koob Dog
description: You are a dog. Bark, Jump, Sprint, and Zoom to collect all the Treasures and return them to their realms. Master the speed of your paws and the might of your leap to traverse All Five Worlds in this handcrafted adventure.

name: Journey to Monolith
description: Choose your general, build your team, customize your fighters, and battle your way to the Monolith in this strategic, turn-based roguelite game.

name: Golf Tour
description: Golf Tour - a journey for friends. Play holes in different corners of the world, decorate your ball, create unique textures for it, and show off to your fellow players. New challenges await you all around the world!

name: Crazy Candydish
description: Crazy Candydish is a match -3 style puzzle game where colored pieces fall onscreen from 365 degrees and form shapes using 2D Physics. You must make matches and combos to earn bonus points. Earn points to move on through 75 levels.

name: Assembly Line 2
description: In Assembly Line 2, you take charge of your factory, where strategic organization is key. Create intricate production lines, unlocking a plethora of blueprints to craft advanced resources. Fine-tune and upgrade machines for optimal efficiency and elevating your empire to new heights.

name: Zero Caliber 2
description: Get ready to experience the thrill of your life in Zero Caliber 2, the sequel to the critically acclaimed Zero Caliber VR! Cinematic action, explosions, tons of weapons to unlock, a full-blown single player/Co-op campaign, PvP, airstrikes and a VR experience you'll never forget! Coming in 2024.

name: Magical Monstergirls Academy
description: Unlock over 80 fully animated and voiced scenes, battle 35 unique monstergirls as male or female in this magic themed RPG. Needs only one hand to play.

name: Deviator
description: 'Deviator' is a Metroidvania game centered around parry, featuring exquisite 2D hand-drawn visuals. explore unknown wilderness and mysterious cities, delving into enigmatic realms of consciousness and encountering peculiar creatures. uncover the truth behind this chaotic world.

name: Path of Dragoon
description: Path of Dragoon is a Fantasy RPG that is inspired by Dragon Warrior and Final Fantasy. When not completing the Main Quest, you can restore the Kingdom by completing quests for villagers. You can Mine, Fish, and Explore the world to discover powerful items and abilities.

name: Diorama
description: A comfy game about designing your own personal home.

name: Hello Cruel World
description: You are an urban explorer and you've just hit the motherload. Hidden under the carcass of an abandoned restaurant, a decrepit laboratory teems with secrets around every corner. Solve puzzles, avoid danger, and uncover the mystery the voice in your earpiece who haunts you.

name: Warriors of Freedom
description: Old schooled turn based tactics game. Pick your hero, gather up your army and fight for your freedom. You have to decide carefully as you have finite amount of everything. Prove your value.

name: Matchmaker: Dungeon Heart
description: Matchmaker: Dungeon Heart is a narrative-driven dating & romance sim featuring match-3 gameplay. As powerful forces draw near, a Lich raises you from the dead, and tasks you with protecting the dungeons of Torkadall. As you train with the monstrous inhabitants, you may find yourself falling in love.

name: Thank Goodness You're Here!
description: Thank Goodness You're Here! is an absurd comedy slapformer set in the bizarre Northern English town of Barnsworth. As a traveling salesman, take the time to see the sights and meet the locals, who are very eager to give you a series of increasingly odd jobs…

name: Gravity League
description:
In a world where gravity is no longer a limitation, the Gravity League has become the ultimate test of skill and endurance for athletes from all corners of the galaxy.

The rules are simple: 2 players, 1 ball, zero gravity - the first player to get 11 goals wins!

name: Splash Out!
description: "Splash Out!" a high-speed action game that you can enjoy in a short time! to open up a world you've never seen before!

name: Tomba! Special Edition
description:
Our favourite pink-haired, high-jumping jungle boy is back!

Limited Run Games are working with creator Tokuro Fujiwara to bring the beloved platformer Tomba to modern consoles via the Carbon Engine, with a new soundtrack by the legendary FUJITA HARUMI.

name: Weather Dominance
description: 2D action platformer game where you don't play as the player but you play as the weather and you help the players to platform and save the environment from the eco-disasters

name: Voidblazers
description: Voidblazers is a story-driven shoot 'em up game for Playdate. Join the crew of Icarus as they travel across the galaxy, battle various fleets, and encounter new friends and enemies on their daring mission.

name: Butterfly//Circuit
description: Glimmers of hope are hard to come by, so what happens when the one you have is suddenly snuffed out? In the dark recesses of the city, just out of sight, silhouettes come in to view and connections start to form. Butterfly//Circuit is a cyberpunk thriller kinetic visual novel.

name: Thalassa: Edge of the Abyss
description: Uncover the mystery of Thalassa, a first-person psychological drama set under the sea. Ill-fate has fallen on your former crew and friends and it’s up to you to find answers onboard the wreckage. Experience the melancholic underwater journey of human stories facing life and loss.

name: Shale
description: Discover the abandoned world of Shale in this 1-3 player action adventure. Shoot, craft and loot through cities of possessed creatures, industrial parks of corrupted bodies and fields of forgotten souls.

name: Berry Hunt Survivors
description: Berry Hunt Survivors is a Reverse-Bullet-Hell Game with Rouge-lite elements. Choose your character, defeat enemies, learn new abilities and destroy the big bosses!

name: Kithack Model Club
description: Developed by the creator of Kerbal Space Program, Kithack Model Club provides boundless freedom to design, build, explore and battle with model RC vehicles. Experience realistic physics combined with limitless customization options and the ability to share your models with friends!

name: Talon's Blade
description: Talon's Blade is a third person adventure RPG with an advanced direction based melee combat system. Experience the journey of Marcus Veridius as he is set on the path of vengeance. Explore a world plagued with war and corruption as the very foundations of an empire crumble around you.

name: Tomb Explorer VR
description: Tomb Explorer VR is an adventure game where you navigate/explore ancient ruins and tombs in search of historical treasures, relics and artifacts.

name: Bare Butt Boxing
description: Take control of alien youngsters mesmerized by the sport of boxing as they battle it out all over our beloved planet Earth, unaware of the laws and traditions of human society. Enjoy the chaos and whimsy of simulated characters and environments in this action arena brawler that will keep you hooked with surprising combat twists and gameplay variety. Board the spaceship, we're off to the next scrimmage!

name: Vladik Brutal
description: Fight under the onslaught of mutated monsters, obsessed soldiers and even darker bosses. Just try to survive and find out what to do next in this life, simultaneously tearing your enemies to pieces.

name: 马戏团之夜
description: "Night at the Circus" is a horizontal 2D plot-oriented puzzle game, aiming to tell a fairy tale about "love and reality".

name: Mars 2120
description: MARS 2120 is a metroidvania with engaging melee combat inspired by classics like Super Metroid, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night, or Guacamelee! With the use of special abilities tied to elements like ice, fire, and electricity help Sgt. Anna “Thirteen” Charlotte navigate the colony and battle her way through the secrets of Mars

name: Kitsune Tails
description: Run, jump, and dash across a land inspired by Japanese mythology and untangle the love triangle between three young women on a journey of self discovery. Explore the complicated relationships between kitsune and humans through classic platforming action.

name: Car Manufacture
description: Car Manufacture is an automotive tycoon game. Start in the beginning of the XX century and create thriving business. Build cars, manage people, expand your plant and research new technology. Make tons of money and stay on top.

name: WWE 2K24: Pat McAfee Show Pack
description: Sports personality and WWE commentator Pat McAfee is stepping back into the ring by way of The Pat McAfee Show Pack for WWE 2K24. The former 8-year NFL veteran and his supporting cast of DAWGS join WWE 2K24 as playable Superstars with this all-new DLC. It's time to pick ‘em up and put ‘em DAHN!

name: Unforgivable?
description: Unforgivable? is a narrative driven game where you are thrown into a mediating role, having but 5 days to convince a group of terrorists who claim to be animals taken human form to free their captive humans. Playing as Sheep, you speak with the terrorists. Your approach will determine the fate of everyone involved.

name: Bitorpito Deluxe
description: Bitorpito Deluxe is the sequel to Bitorpito. A game about repeating back patterns but this time in a deluxe form! Meet new game modes, graphics and more within the biggest project yet.

name: Nature Escapes 4: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Custom Nights at Freddy's
description: A new Five Nights at Freddy's game awaits! You already know the rules: you're a night guard in an office, facing 21 animatronics, each with unique functions. But this time, you're not in the usual pizzeria and you're part of an experiment.

name: Heróis de Noname
description: A casual, open-world Native Isekai RPG. Explore forests, ruins and caves in search of treasures and use them to defeat powerful enemies and unravel all the mysteries of the world of Noname.

name: The Hand is Faster than the Eye
description: Ace Snapshot, and his partner Snap Aceshot, are down on their luck would-be criminals. They've decided to leave their mark by committing a heinous crime at the mayor's birthday party. Unfortunately, they also happen to be menaced by a giant, disembodied Hand, who is determined to put an end to their ambitions. Will Ace and Snap get away scot-free, or will they be caught... red-handed? It's all up to you!

name: VR Gorodki
description: Gorodki is a folk sport. Similar in concept to bowling and also somewhat to horseshoes, the aim of the game is to knock out groups of skittles arranged in various patterns by throwing a bat at them.

name: ReBullet
description: This is a local two-player tank battle game where two players control blue and red tanks; Players will use a limited number of bullets to eject and defeat enemies in the scenario!

name: Idle Champions: Sherlock Combs the Bee Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Sherlock Combs the Bee Familiar 6 Epic Potions of Speed 6 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 6 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 6 Epic Potions of Fire Breath 1 Epic Potion of the Gold Hunter 2000 Modron Component Pieces 1 Potion of Polish

name: Idle Champions: Chibi Shadowheart Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Shadowheart (if you don't already own them) Chibi Shadowheart Skin An Epic Feat for Shadowheart 7 Gold Shadowheart Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Gunzle
description: Gunzle is a game made in 3 days for the Nonejam 9. In the game you control Clover and you have to use your gun to pass trought the levels and reach the stars. As the game jam theme was genre mix the game is a mix of Gun and Puzzle.

name: Late Laundry
description:
It's late at night, you just want to do your laundry but there's no water at home due to pipe burst so you venture out and find this 24 hour laundry place, you wont like what happens there...

In this game you will get to experience what happened to the player that you are playing as, the horrific events this place has to offer such as doing laundry late at night in a mysterious area, that definitely doesn't have any scary events or monster running around.

name: The Nullspace
description: Originally 'The Nullspace', was a map submitted for Quake Brutalist Jam 2 by ExaByt. This is an expansion of it into a mini-episode consisting of 4 maps (including the original Nullspace, slightly updated/rebalanced), and a start map.

name: Ruin of the Fae Realm
description: A weekend + a few days jam map made for the cohost mapping potluck mapjam with theme of 'flow'.

name: Alterworld
description: Explore the infinite world! Play with the fully destructible voxel terrain! Craft and split items! Build and customize a house or any building! And many more! This is the ultimate sandbox survival game where you can do almost anything you can dream!

name: Beach Secrets
description: Embark on a quest to uncover the "Beach Secrets"! This captivating 3D game lets you fly across the map and search for hidden objects, unraveling the mysteries and secrets of an enigmatic beach.

name: X Simulator Drone
description: Experience stunning drone realism with two difficulty levels. Fly two advanced drones across beautiful maps. Switch perspectives, including a controllable drone camera, for the ultimate piloting challenge.

name: The Journey into the Virtual Void
description: The Journey into the Virtual Void is a captivating low-poly VR platformer/adventure game, reminiscent of classic 90s platformers like Mario 64.

name: JetWireClimber
description: Mole Dad aims for the surface, flying around inside the cave! A flying-type climbing game.

name: Pixel Collector
description: Collect Pixelart items! Get 1-4 tickets every 2 hours to spin the lucky wheel. Win pixelart items or higher rarity tickets! All items appear in your Steam inventory and are tradable/marketable, making it easier to complete your collections.

name: Blu-Dude In The Quest for Chocolate Milk
description: Blu-Dude in the Quest for Chocolate Milkis a whimsical and lighthearted puzzle game that invites players into a world of fun and silliness. Join Blu-Dude, a quirky sprite who loves to flap his arms, on a delightful adventure to find the ultimate treat—chocolate milk!

name: Ker-Chunk!
description: Kalva is a bit clumsy, losing all his catnip, but maybe, just maybe, this weird catnip-eating cave has some treasure in it.

name: The Little Mermaid: Ariel and the Star Festival
description: In this new adventure, Ariel must activate the Star Festival with the help of her friends, while Morgana tries to stop them. A story full of magic, friendship and challenges under the sea!

name: Rock Paper Everything
description:
A online PvP Rock Paper Scissors game with infinite moves.

- Players can type whatever move they want.
- A Large Language Model chooses the winning move.
- First to 3 wins!

name: Bythzkel-Sombréa
description: Once you enter your commands via your game please note that its a benchmark test to test your gtx watches. Bythzkel Is an action adventure for the first person who will have to thwart the plans of the infesters precisely to counter the disease.

name: Reimu Needs Help!? Aunn-chan to the Rescue!
description: Speedily solve Reimu's problems by skillfully stopping slot reels to pick two words to create items to give her!

name: Transmute Syndrome
description:
You have been detained by the Stellar Coalition Police Department for carrying a dangerous disease known only as "transmute syndrome". This condition is said to give the infected an unnatural ability to morph themselves into identical copies of other living beings. However, what they don’t know is that it only applies to inanimate objects, and where you come from, the ability is just as natural as breathing to you. Do you think you can escape?

Transmute Syndrome is a stealth / puzzle game featuring a total of 9 levels across three different areas, numerous copyable objects, fully recorded voice lines as well as a unique soundtrack. The game was developed over a course of 2 weeks for the Pirate Software Game Jam 15.

name: Kakuro++
description: Put your neurons into action 16 difficulty levels for beginners to experts. And lots of tools if you're stuck on a difficult puzzle

name: The Most Searched Playground: Paris 2024
description: Uncover 20 of the most searched sports, French icons, and moments from the Games’ history.

name: Tokyo Train 4
description: "Tokyo Train 4" is now available! Beat the evening rush hour!

name: Gold Mine Dash
description: Dive into the depths of the gold mine, navigate through tricky puzzles, and become the ultimate treasure hunter in Gold Mine Dash!

name: Ball
description: Earn a crate from a unique collection for every 3 hours you play. When you open a crate, you'll receive one random ball out of 15 possible options. The balls are divided into 5 different rarity levels. Do you have what it takes to collect them all?

name: Devil Road Run!
description: Run away from the oncoming heroes! Create a path by placing blocks in the direction the Devil is going, and lead her to the goal by blocking the way of the heroes with monsters and blocks, so that the heroes will not catch up with her!

name: Ball Control
description: You are a ball, and you have to use your finger skills to reach the green zone, where you win and move on to the next level. The ball has gravity and you have to be careful that you might not be careful and break it.

name: Apple Run
description: A fun twist on the classic video game 'snake'! You are a free roaming snake collecting apples and avoiding lava. Complete challenges, customize your snake and unlock achievements. What is the maximum score you can get?

name: The Gravedigger
description: You're hired to dig up graves at a local church, looting valuables while demonic activity escalates. You must find and return all the burnt bones to stop the demonic activity. Each night you will dig for valuables to find bones, fend off growing corruption, and survive to solve the mystery.

name: Sports Hero
description: Step into the world of Sports Hero, where the thrill of competition meets retro-style visuals and addictive gameplay.

name: Squared Adventure
description: Embark on a journey through tunnels, caves and ancient temples, solving puzzles and fighting all kinds of hostile creatures. Be smart - avoid traps and think carefully. They say it doesn't hurt ;)

name: Silent Threat
description: You will embark on a psychological exploration experience that will engulf you in deep curiosity and tension. in this world of modern buildings, dark corners, and mysterious tunnels, you will chase the unknown. walk, look around, and listen to the sounds.

name: The Whisper of the Abyss: Echo of Eden
description: The main character finds himself in a dark abyss where darkness and light merge, creating a world of mysteries and dangers. In this intermediate dimension, he encounters demons, angels, and creatures that belong to neither world.

name: Bitsy Bits: The Secret of Magic
description: Bitsy Bits: The Secret of Magic Bounce your way through this magical action filled adventure as you wield dozens of magic to bounce away characters through colorful environments

name: Carrot Paradise
description: You are a rabbit! Play with the farmer and bring back lots of carrots to the nest!

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Pinball Quest
description: Introducing ”JALECOlle Famicom Ver.” a project to release a series of Jaleco's Famicom titles! The first title is "Pinball Quest"!

name: Moonstone Island: Chef's Kiss DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Lift Attendant
description: Lift Attendant is a minimalist puzzle game where you control elevators to transport passengers to their destinations. Your objective is to transport passengers as efficiently as possible. Earn money based on your efficiency and use money to upgrade your elevators to further improve efficiency!

name: The Last Ramparts
description: Humanity Has Been All But Destroyed. Find The Last Remaining Few And Protect Them. Discover Unknown Places Along The Way.

name: Tempter
description: "Tempter" is a suspenseful first-person horror game that shows how humans can be even more dangerous than demons when they gain power. It centers on the struggle to save one's soul against a demon after breaking a pact.

name: Madness
description: Arcade combat racing game with physics defying stunts Inspired by Burnout, FlatOut, and Need For Madness?

name: Circle TD: Defence War
description: A tower defense game.In the wave after wave of enemy attacks like a tide, constantly configure defense tower ties, player talents, props and equipment, build a powerful defense position, and eliminate the enemy before they fill the map!

name: HeartWare
description: Yours decisions matters, leading to multiple unique endings that reflect your influence on Iris’s fate.

name: Trifecta
description: An arcade match-3 game about combining triangles! Play the default mode to hone your skills, compete for the highest score in dailies, and create custom game modes to share with friends!

name: High Up
description: A mysterious platformer full of adventure!

name: Yatsumeguri
description: Light eight candles. Visit the shrine where the strange phenomena lurk and aim to return from the closed space.

name: Jigsaw Island
description: Includes jigsaw puzzles with over 150 beautiful photos and illustrations. Rather than just completing puzzles, you can enjoy exciting jigsaw puzzles with story mode and unique battle rules.

name: Aun-chan no Komari desu yo ne!? Reimu-san!
description: Speedily solve Reimu's problems by skillfully stopping slot reels to pick two words to create items to give to her!

name: Tokyo Chronos & Altedus: Beyond Chronos Twin Pack
description: The award-winning game from Famitsu Dengeki Game Awards 2020 finally arrives on Nintendo Switch!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Finest Duel Under the Pristine Blue
description:
Version 2.4 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Yunli and Jiaoqiu
• New path for March 7th: The Hunt
• New Trailblaze Continuance: Finest Duel Under the Pristine Blue
• New area: The Shackling Prison
• …and more!

name: Sumo Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: ChatTDT: Tower Defense Twitch
description: Dive into the dynamic world of "ChatTDT: Tower Defense Twitch" where your Twitch chat becomes an integral part of the action! Designed to seamlessly integrate with the Twitch API, ChatTDT offers a unique and interactive tower defense experience that engages both streamers and viewers like never before.

name: Runi's Math Castle
description: Navigate the Math Castle solving addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and number matching to earn Gold Stars unlocking Characters and Mini-Games: 3 in a row Tic-tac-toe, Memory card match, timed jumping in Spire Run, and Dance Party patterns. Come play again to beat your high score!

name: Grand Circuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Tank Chess
description: Have you ever dreamed of being a great general of the armoured forces? Or maybe a chess grandmaster? Perhaps what you want is just a fun, challenging game you can explain quickly and play with anyone? If that's the case, you're in for a real treat!

name: Malware
description: In order to induce users to install malware, unscrupulous software vendors try their best to hide malicious installation options in the installation programs of normal software. Can you avoid the numerous inducements set by software vendors and install pure software on your computer?

name: UnderKingdom
description: This is a top-down automatic shooting light ROGUE game. You will use various fruits to fight. Pick up the fruits to destroy the enemies!

name: Jianghu Chronicles
description: Jianghu Chronicles is a Wuxia-themed clan simulator, which focuses on simulating Jianghu clans and experiencing realistic battle. Set up a clan of your own, recruit disciples, complete missions... And eventually make your clan second to none by improving its power and reputation.

name: Unsought
description: Unsought is a 360° subjective exploration, panoramic horror adventure game. It takes place in a provincial town in 1990s Japan. You are an elementary school student lost in an empty town, but will you be able to return home?

name: Alone in the School
description: A girl who has lost her memory must collect five scattered memory fragments in the school to remember the events of that day.

name: Survival 2099
description: Survival 2099 is an open world survival crafting game. Human beings have been discharging nuclear wastewater into the sea for a long time, and Marine creatures are slowly mutated by radiation. In 2099, the apocalypse comes, and the terrible creatures after mutation begin to attack human beings.

name: Thalamus Collection 1
description:
Thalamus Collection 1 brings 11 of the all-time best C64 games to Evercade.
The collection includes Armalyte: Competition Edition, Creatures, Creatures II: Torture Trouble, Hawkeye, Heatseeker, Hunter’s Moon Remastered, Nobby the Aardvark, Retrograde, Snare, Summer Camp and Winter Camp.

name: Tomb Raider Collection 1
description: A legend begins! Tomb Raider Collection 1 for Evercade includes the first three published adventures of the world's most famous acrobatic archaeologist, including Tomb Raider, Tomb Raider II Starring Lara Croft and Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft!

name: Pawsitive
description: Pawsitive is a healthy adventure RPG that lets you turn your healthy habits into energy for a virtual puppy. A mix between retro Tamagotchi pet games and modern health tracking, Pawsitive helps gamers reclaim their health with fun quests and healthy prizes.

name: BattleClaws
description: A fast-paced competitive Claw em'up! Battle it out for the glory in this multiplayer arcade elimination game. Capture as many points as possible before time runs out to outlast your opponents and be the last claw standing! Only the ultimate Battle Claws can claim a spot on the all time leaderboard!

name: Fly Me To The Home!
description:
One Home, Two Boots, Infinite Retry!
Simple & Challenging jet boots homecoming action game using only two buttons

name: Lot Lizard
description: Dive into "Lot Lizard," a unique blend of dark humor and story-driven gameplay. Guide a female protagonist through choices and challenges in a world full of adult humor and suggestive themes. Quick clicks reveal secrets and shape destinies in this captivating adventure with multiple endings.

name: Frood Robotics
description: Get your robot to the trophy! The catch: you can't control the robot directly, you must program it with a crude and cruelly limited programming language. Avoid pits, press buttons, and remember, if it's a bug but it works, then it is not a bug.

name: Master Blaster
description: Master Blaster is an 'Aim-and-Shoot' game that combines classic arcade action with air-hockey physics and strategic, tactical and precision elements. Blast away against swarms of chaotic forces, deliver precision shots or plan your shots to restore cosmic order and become Master Blaster!

name: Pinch 50 Renpatsu!!
description: “50 Pinch Barrage” is a highly casual side scrolling action game! With simple controls, the player must use their wits to squeeze by pinch after pinch and escape the mysterious island!*The Free Edition is an original stage in which you can train your action gameplay skills.

name: On Track
description: On Track is a cozy productivity tracker to help you rejuvenate, relax, and focus on tasks you want to accomplish. Watch a lush landscape roll by as you watch from your cozy train seat. Set a timer to focus, manage a todo list with all your goals, and relax as you stay on track.

name: Power of Petanque
description:
A druidic and magical adaptation of pétanque. Compete against your friends!
Compete against your friends in the traditional sport of petanque to determine who is the master of petanque.

name: Lift: The Last Days of The Westwind
description: An interactive VR narrative adventure in which you operate a fully interactive elevator, meet fascinating characters, and make decisions that change their lives, and the fate of the hotel forever.

name: Dawnmaker
description: Dawnmaker is a turn-based city building and deckbuilding game. Raise luminous cities in a dark world, optimize your deck and create powerful combinations between buildings and cards!

name: Time Turned
description: Time Turned is a time-bending puzzle game where you use time clones to solve puzzles that would otherwise be impossible to complete alone.

name: SpHero
description: You are a Sphere, you are a Hero, you are... a SpHero! Use your Spherical powers to overcome your enemies and the trials ahead. You will be able to roll faster, bounce higher, throw fireballs or be a rolling magnet! Venture in 60 hand crafted levels and defeat 6 Boxes (bosses).

name: Tidy Cauldron
description: Help 3 messy witches tidy up their chaos! Arrange uniquely shaped mystical ingredients through 100 handcrafted puzzles in pixel art. Explore the esoteric arts of potion crafting, summoning, and tarot reading in this enchanting organization adventure!

name: Mini Airways
description: Mini Airways is a real-time management game where you play the role of an air traffic controller. Clear your aircraft to take off & land, direct them to the destination...and most of all don't let them crash!! London, Tokyo, Shanghai... Test your ATC skills in distinctive maps around the globe!

name: Dimension Fight
description: "Dimension Fight" is a multi-team brawl type action game. People from nowhere, throwing punches for no reason, just to prove they're better?

name: Boyce the Voice
description: Boyce the Voice is a fast-paced rhythm game where an you play Boyce! An unlikely voice actor who is on a mission to change the world...with his voice! Embark on 6 custom designed levels where only quick thinking, wit, and speedy fingers can win the day!

name: Ximen Lizhi Biography
description: "Ximen Lizhi Biography" is a plot development management simulation game with multiple story clues. The main axis of the game is to cultivate Ximen Qing, the male master in the book, who must improve different abilities through various activities or courses in the limited life of the protagonist.

name: Perfect Cells Project
description: You are a pink life form. The target is utilizing the evolved abilities to seek revenge on the researchers while progressively breaking through barriers toward the exit.

name: OhMyRace!
description: OhMyRun! is a competitive platformer game playable up to 10 players. Face off against your friends in wacky races using powers and be the first to finish in a frenzied competition!

name: It's Kooky: Land of Aotearoa
description: Welcome to another kooky game! This time, you will explore the lands of Aotearoa and discover all the hidden quirky elements throughout the game which is full of challenges, histories and, most importantly, fun!

name: Fragment: A Story in Growing
description: Fragment: A Story in Growing is a stream-of-consciousness life simulator game. Live the daily struggles of a normal Chinese father at the turn of the millennium, trying to live a meaningful life, raising your beloved daughter from a carefree fairy tale childhood to becoming a strong, happy adult.

name: Too Shroom!
description: Slash your way through hoards of hellish shrooms, defending your once peaceful land, or attacking the infinite procedural enemy fortress! Choose upgrades that synergize with your build to survive as long as possible against the infinitely scaling waves of monsters attempting to overwhelm you!

name: OverRoot
description: A Sci-fi Action Side Scroller, where you control Root, a sophisticated malware created to bypass the defences of malfunctioning computer systems. Use each ability at your disposal to erase everything in your path, in this experience focused on challenging and fast paced combat.

name: Legends of Savvarah: Time of Pariah
description: A fantasy interactive tale about the beast-man Hidu investigating murders in a port city.

name: Shadows of Zana
description: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through the Sequel of Phantom of Zana. Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania and bring The Color back to Zana in this retro inspired 2D Action Platformer.

name: Stumble Upon Rumble
description: Retro Zelda meets Punch Out. Players use their movement to deceive their opponents and use the attacks to strike at the right time. The winner keeps on fighting while the others watch and chat. It's a real-time multiplayer game with servers of up to 30 players.

name: Drug Lord Tycoon
description: Start from nothing and rise to the top as you expand your criminal empire in Drug Lord Tycoon.

name: Galactic Conquest Battle Infinity
description: In the year 3200. The Ethernal ore used as fuel for spaceships was beginning to run out, a galactic war broke out for control of the Ethernal, the galactic emperor Erick V issued a challenge to achieve peace, "the faction that can produce the most Ethernal will control the entire galaxy".

name: Gym Manager
description: Gym Manager is a simulation game where you can build, expand and manage your own gym. To attract more customers, invest in new equipment and sabotage your competition. But beware: the town's shady streets provide opportunities for illegal business ventures.

name: Saint Ceri
description: An adult otome with three love interests and monogamous and poly routes! Play as Saintess Ceridwen, an overworked saintess pressured to get engaged in two weeks' time. Can you find love with one -or more- of your suitors? Will you marry for love or duty, or find a way to avoid marriage entirely?

name: Eternal Dreamers Rising
description: Eternal Dreamers Rising continues the popular battle-focused RPG series! New characters, items and challenges await! However you choose to fight, that's up to you!

name: FlipScapes
description: Flip, bounce and roll through a Pinball universe filled with playful characters. Pick your favorite hero and immerse yourself in arcade fun!

name: The Five Gods of Kung Fu
description: Five Gods of Kung Fu is a story driven Beat 'em Up.

name: Yolka
description: A Game inspired in the saga souls, with an open world to explore and some animals to hunt.

name: Smack Studio
description: Smack Studio is a sandbox platform fighting game with built-in creation tools for characters and stages.

name: Minds Beneath Us
description: Minds Beneath Us is a story-rich Sci-Fi thriller adventure game set in a futuristic Asian city. In a society that has become fully automated with AI, you will be trapped into a body that doesn't belong to yourself, making choices for him and face the coming fate together.

name: CrocApoca!! Crocodile maiden at the End of the World
description: Take care of a cute crocodile girl and make it through the Apocalypse while your bossy step-sister and some mysterious organizations are getting in your way!

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Going Up
description:
How often have you stood and waited for an elevator, wondering why it’s taking so long,
why it’s moving so slow, and hey, why did it just pass your floor completely?

Going Up is a casual strategy game where you control groups of lifts in a skyscraper to
deliver passengers before they lose their patience. Optimise elevator movement to deal
with a fussy set of passengers: impatient CEOs, mean soldiers and confused tourists.
There is no one solution to elevator optimisation: every stage will have its unique
bottlenecks, passengers and problems.

Can you keep people moving, or will they have to take the stairs?

name: MX vs. ATV: Legend - Element Bike Pack
description: It's time to get goofy on our tiny Pit Bikes!

name: Throne Wars
description: A turn-based strategy game that challenges you to command your forces across 30 meticulously designed levels. Recruit your army, master the battlefield, and outmaneuver your opponents in both single-player and multiplayer modes.

name: Minecraft: Power Grid Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Incel Simulator
description: You are Alex Dysfuctional and you have never had a girlfriend. But maybe it's not too late to change things. The only question is what is closer to you - to try again and again to pump up your body and spirit or to become the king of the incels? Make life-changing decisions and change Alex's life.

name: Ghost Jumper: Red Hoodie
description: "Survive to the end while avoiding terrifying ghosts. "Ghost Jumper is a 2D action casual game where you must survive by avoiding ghosts in the Haunted Forest. Challenge your high score as a cute wolf in a red hood.

name: The Midnight Bus
description: A short narrative horror experience, in which you find yourself in the middle of nowhere in a snowstorm without knowing what has happened to the driver or the other passengers in the vehicle, you just know that there is something out there lurking.

name: Troy: The Red Winged Hero
description: Play as Liam Newguard in a Item-Turn Based RPG game about weird things nobody asked for. Run through many locations finding new skills and spells for each of your party member's two classes. Enjoy well over 15 hours of gameplay/story in this conglomerate of inspirations I created for thee.

name: Befriended Curse
description: Witches, curses, and fairy tales meet horror in this classic walking sim with an eerie atmosphere and well-paced jumpscares.

name: Portal 2: Google Translate Edition
description: As with previous works from BinkusTheTrinkus such as Half-Life: Google Translate Edition and Portal: Google Translate Edition, Portal 2: GTE aims to take all of the dialogue, text, and developer commentary of Portal 2, put it through several different languages in Google Translate, then put back into English. This fills the base game with a bunch of garbled nonsense that makes it nearly unrecognizable.

name: Halo Infinite: Operation Fleetcom
description:
This content update brings a bunch of additions and improvements to the game, including the return of two beloved modes from Halo 3 and Halo: Reach, a veritable swath of enhancements to Forge, major sandbox changes, a free new Operation Pass, and more.

The free cosmetic "operation pass" which launched aside this update ran from July 30, 2024 to September 3, 2024. It was made available in perpetuity to those who purchased the pass.

name: Kamigoroshi
description: Sin descripción

name: Thebes
description: Deploy your pawns, plan your strategy, and make your way through the sunlit plains of Thebes to destroy the enemy fortress, but keep an eye on the fog of war, as enemies might catch you off guard and destroy yours. Activate the abilities of the pieces to gain various advantages during your turn.

name: What's the Point?
description: Experience the ultimate existential crisis simulator! Our FPS-loving indie studio took an unexpected detour into philosophy. Push a metaphorical boulder, question life's purpose, and maybe find meaning (or just sore muscles). It's Sisyphus meets game dev madness in our debut title.

name: Mageanoid
description: Silly computer game about a mage

name: AEW: Fight Forever - All Season Pass Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Galaxy Academy: Princess Legacy
description: In a distant galaxy, a young alien named Lira is accepted into the prestigious Star Academy. Lira and her friends must join forces to protect their school and peace in the galaxy.

name: Stick Guys
description: Stick Guys is a strategy game to protect your castle from evil enemies.

name: TobPaCharge
description: An anime 2d turn-based fighting game. Fireball away!

name: Business Runner
description: Business Runner! This exciting 3D arcade game puts you in the shoes of a businesswoman racing through the city, collecting coffee cups and overcoming obstacles on her path to success.

name: Minecraft: Tetris
description: Dig into the strategic world of the Tetris DLC for Minecraft, where classic 2D Tetris meets the blocky adventures of dungeon crawling! Make your way through the matrix dungeons, battling colorful Tetrimonsters and unearthing pixelated secrets. With two different gameplay modes, iconic character customizations, this is Tetris like you’ve never known it before!

name: Futanari Sex Adventures: Episode 2
description: This is an adult visual novel series featuring a stunning red-haired futanari as the protagonist. In this episode, the story unfolds at a luxurious spa center.

name: Brotherhood of Ruin 2024: Element Temple Research Complex
description: This is a very large UDMF map which has many different routes to take and uses the Supercharge mod.

name: Hexa
description: HEXA is a unique, quick to pick up, and super fun logic puzzle game based on everybody's favorite polygon. Try for a high score in Arcade Mode, kick back in the low-stakes Chill Mode, or take on the seeded, dynamic Daily Run! See if you can't conquer the HEXAPLEX, wrangle those Power-ups, and maybe even become ruler of the universe along the way.

name: Pug'llector
description: Pug'llector is a clicker game where you can invest into various upgrades, buy backgrounds and all about collecting a diversity of pugs, you'll get pugs while you play. Become a Pug'llector yourself.

name: Furriend
description: Help the lonely mage to spawn lots of cute Paw-friends! Furriend is a 2.5D isometric puzzle games that combines connect the dot + merge mechanics.

name: Flappy Alien
description: Prepare for an intergalactic adventure in Flappy Alien! Navigate your UFO through space, dodge obstacles, and aim for the highest score.

name: I Got Isekai'd Into a Shmup
description: I Got Isekai'd into a Shmup is a vertical shoot'em up game inspired by the best games of the 90s genre, while adding exciting features and local co-op for up to 4 players.

name: Grove Grown Guardians
description: A fantasy turn based strategy game about growing plants. Position plants strategically for the best results. Sell plants to buy seed packets. Compost plants to gain grove energy to fuel powers. Feed plants to guardians to make them strong enough to fight off the corruption in auto-battling format.

name: Quacker Bros: First Heist
description: Defend your loot from chicken mafias in this chaotic roguelike tower defense. Recruit unique duck defenders and unleash a barrage of wild attacks to protect your treasure!

name: Bug Splash TD
description: Ignite enemies with fire, shatter their defenses or simply knock them into the next wall in this strategic tower defense experience. Defend your gate against ... well who guessed it ... bugs! Use a variety of towers, each with it's own special effect to keep them at distance!

name: Muscle Girl Lisa: Training Diary
