description: "Muscle Girl Lisa: Training Diary" is a visual novel game that follows the story of Lisa, a cute girl from the United Kingdom who aspires to be a bodybuilder. Make the right choices to help Lisa grow her muscles and enjoy unique dates with her.

name: Geometry Dabs: Save the World
description: Geometry Dabs, a dangerous drug, has brainwashed countless individuals into becoming mindless slaves for its creator, RopTob. The exact purpose of RopTob's control over these victims remains unclear, but it surely cannot be anything good. Your goal is to rescue these people from RopTob

name: Avian Enigma
description: Avian enigma is a sci-fi visual novel game featuring in a world where birds have become extinct. The story begins with a young man working in a factory accidentally saves a bird. Soon, a girl who has a mysterious relationship with birds appears in front of him. A romance with a tiny twist begins.

name: The Back
description: 《Back》is a full-motion audio live horror game. Special Note 1: This game is very supernatural and scary, timid or heart disease players do not buy！！！！ The game will reveal different ending plots step by step through various searches and choices for your character.

name: A Better Tomorrow
description: Join the green revolution! Relax and learn about clean energy in this cozy, minimalist 2D city-building strategy game. Build windmills, solar panels, and more to provide energy to villages and cities while protecting the environment. Let's work together to make 'A Better Tomorrow'!

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Knuckles
description: Knuckles is ready to rumble! Muscle your way through all who dare stand in your path as the burly echidna.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Amy
description: Make way for the positive pink hedgehog with a strong sense of justice, because Amy Rose is here!

name: Midnight Collection
description: ~ Midnight Deluxe + Birthday of Midnight ~

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Tails
description: Tails, the genius mechanic and Sonic’s closest friend, is ready to take flight on the course!

name: 24H Stories: The Cabin In The Forest
description: This is a game about rule creepypastas. You are trapped in a cabin in the forest, and you need to find a way to leave by following the diaries and messages. How should these rules be followed? You have to figure it out yourself.

name: MiuSa
description: Players use their own polished decks to engage in a spectacular battle with their enemies. Carefully selected cards come out with a "stat explosion" aesthetic and enemies that pit against the cards you play with their unique mechanics.

name: Railway Empire 2: High Voltage
description: Strap in and turn up the power! Railway Empire 2 - High Voltage is ready to charge into the age of railway electrification. With 10 brand new electric locomotives, tycoons become well-equipped to conquer the steep mountains and impressive gorges of the Swiss Alps.

name: Spellfarers
description: Farm, fish, craft, and cast spells with your friends in this idyllic, magical multiplayer farming sim. Befriend the townsfolk of Wenngrove, learn their trades and stories, tend your home with your friends and Familiar, and make magic in Spellfarers.

name: Rogue Tiles
description: Rogue Tiles merges tower defense with roguelike elements, offering a dynamic experience where you shape the expanding path. Unlock, build, upgrade, and defend against waves of enemies.

name: Kappa's Asylum
description: Kappa's Asylum is a survival horror game in which you control a youtuber in an abandoned asylum to record a video.

name: Bunny Alice in Wonderland
description: On this fantastical journey, you will use your extraordinary observation skills and, along with your companions, overcome all obstacles and challenges, bravely moving forward!

name: Endless Casual Drive
description: This is an immersive leisure solo journey. All you have to do is focus on driving and enjoy driving. Slowly gain peace and return to yourself in the white noise brought by the engine and the environment.

name: Cozy Night
description: A fun game of ball combining in a house where it's cold outside but warm inside.

name: Hitobashira: Human Suika
description: A fun human fusion puzzle game, merge people to sacrifice them and feed their souls to the Monolith.

name: Unstable Cylinder
description: This is a platformer action adventure in which the main character, trapped inside a long cylinder prison, attempts to escape. Escape by climbing over steep walls, a turbulent world, moving scaffolding, and other obstacles! Of course, it would be infinitely close to impossible.

name: Hadley's Run: A Starship Saga
description: Slay your way through a relentless enemy horde in this roguelike twin-stick shooter. Kick ass. Find love. Save the universe.

name: One More Night
description: You will have to survive zombies and mysterious creatures in a fantasy world, in which you find your lost brother, while you will level up and you will have 2 weapons with you throughout the adventure, you will be able to explore a giant world without restrictions

name: Podnabu
description: Podnabu is a fantasy world where villages, forests, fields, and meadows sprawl. A place shrouded in the mystery of and wondrous laws of nature. Many wanderers have become entangled in the secrets of this world. But perhaps it is you who can unravel the true essence of this world.

name: Espionage Activity
description: Espionage Activity is an isometric stealth action game focused on a fast-paced gameplay loop in enclosed spaces. Overcome challenging encounters by incapacitating guards with your powerful takedowns, or utilize your superior mobility to run circles around them. Now, complete your mission!

name: Time Is Honey
description: Time Is Honey is a relaxing idle game where you open packs to discover a variety of unique bees. Take care of them in real-time and then turn it all into profit. Unlock and customize all of the unique hives and enjoy completing your collection of bees.

name: Capital Dilemma
description: Navigate corporate chaos in this minimalist management game. Swipe to make decisions, increase your stock price, and balance metrics to stay in power.

name: Happy Color Links
description: An adorable sokoban puzzle game , where you push blocks from the same color to link them together and make them happy.

name: Champion of Venus: Tayla's Big Adventure
description: Join Tayla on her biggest, bustiest adventure so far! Unravel a conspiracy of gods and monsters, square off with the most lustful Champions in existence, and uncover the stadium's mysteries!Like, totally!

name: Tower of Hidden Waifus
description: Discover desire in Tower of Hidden Waifus, a unique hidden object game. Ascend the tower, find over 600 enticing waifus, and unlock sensual encounters with animated passion. Explore secrets, master challenges, and unveil your deepest desires.

name: Rocket Jump Race
description: Have you ever wondered what would be races like if wheels never invented? You are about to find out. Rocket Jump Race is a FPS racing game that we compete with the explosive force of our weapons. If you are here to be the last player standing by destroying your rivals, you came to the wrong place.

name: Scent of Greed
description: As a psychology student, you find yourself isolated for an entire summer break in a desolate village. While trying to survive you must manage limited resources, explore, scavenge and unravel a chilling horror story. Yet, in this eerie place, you're never truly alone.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Takahashi Takeda
description:
Seeking to right the wrongs of his past, Takeda swears to rip up Earthrealm's underworld by the roots.

This pack includes playable character Takeda Takahashi, including all new move-sets.

name: Lloyd the Monkey 3: Judgement Day
description: Two years have passed since Lloyd and Lura defeated Kronos and his Dark Gorillas, seemingly once and for all, and the duo have gone their seperate ways. However, the villain Scholz is ripping his way through countless lives in order to complete a decade-spanning plan to conquer the universe once and for all. The final battle is about to begin, and the blood shed at the end of it all will sow the seeds of a new beginning.

name: Dwarves Mining Idle
description: Starting with a lonely Dwarf, endlessly mine to gather materials and use them to progress farther. Have more Dwarves join in, craft resources and upgrade literally everything! The mines of the idle Dwarves await you!

name: Arc Seed
description: Face the interstellar Archangels in a turn-based tactical game with deckbuilding elements and destructible environment, where you pilot powerful mechs to save the Earth from destruction.

name: Songs of Death
description: Roguelite, rhythm，survival game. You need to play the role of Ma Chao, upgrade weapons in the battle, combine fetters, break through the tight encirclement, fight your way out, even if cursed by the world, you have to kill your father's enemy Cao Cao!

name: Flip TD: Tower Defense
description: Flip Tower Defense on it's head in Flip TD. Flip your world upside down to defend with towers, upgrades, modifiers, powers, and more. Build custom worlds with the in-game world builder and share them online to compete for high scores in the community leaderboards.

name: Space for Sale
description: Space for Sale follows the journey of an intergalactic property developer on a mission to build habitats for eccentric alien clients. Discover the wonders scattered throughout the new solar system you bought on the cheap, build estates and sell them for a sweet profit!

name: Go Slo
description: Guide Motty towards their enemies as Slo travels the forest. Touch/click actively, or just watch as Motty uses his auto-attack sense abilities to attack them. Collect spores dropped from enemies and use these to develop abilities further. Collect spores from friends you discover on the map

name: Stormgate
description: Stormgate is a free-to-play, next-gen RTS from the team at Frost Giant Studios, including former developers of Warcraft III and StarCraft II. Command mechs to defend the Earth or invade it as one of two other invading alien factions. Explore an ever-evolving campaign storyline, group up for co-op missions, or compete in 1v1. Now in Early Access since August 13th.

name: The Garden Path
description: A slice-of-life sim about the joy of gardening, designed to be picked up and played in short and sweet bites. Whether you’re fishing, growing, trading, or making new vegetable friends, a wonderful and wistful adventure awaits when wandering The Garden Path.

name: Deepsea Salvor
description: This highly randomized action rogue-like is all about strategic positioning and using power-ups to their fullest extent. Look for frequent updates to this early access title.

name: Trash Bandits
description: It’s garbage day! Play as raccoon thief Ricky Stripe in this fast-paced platformer as he grapples, bounces, and rolls his way through Grove City - stealing from humans and animals alike! Create and share custom levels, attract guests to your animal hotel, and steal whatever you can get your paws on!

name: Karma
description: Explore the mysterious world of hell in this walking simulator. Search for six hearts while encountering strange characters and impressive landscapes. The haunting music, composed for this game, draws you deeper into the depths of hell.

name: Hidden Cursed Crypt
description: The slip gate takes Ranger to what looks to be a guarded crypt in the side of a mountain. He's not keen to find out what is going on and would rather get out of there. Unfortunately, the exit is locked behind a gold key out of reach.

name: Chainsaw Juice King
description: Fruit hunting meets an idle tycoon adventure. Equip your chainsaw, hunt quirky live fruits, and turn them into delicious juice to grow your juice empire.

name: Yandere Minesweeper
description: You met a cute girl who seems to be into you, maybe a little too much. Can you defuse her desires?

name: Sonic Endless Adventure
description:
Welcome to Sonic Endless Adventure! This is a fan game in which there level created in real time.
In the game you will visit the Green hill level, again. You have only 3 lives, losing them, will end the level. During the passage you will encounter Red Star Rings. With it you can open music for the level.

name: Towerful Defense
description: A roguelike tower defense where you control a single tower to fight against hordes of aliens coming from all directions. Pick your tower, equip up to 4 skills, and choose from a variety of traits and unique effect items to craft powerful builds that lead you to victory.

name: Subway Surge
description: Subway Surge is a fun endless runner game featuring pirate heroes. Navigate using your mouse, and collect gold coins by running, jumping, and sliding. Help the pirates gather all the gold!

name: Diamond
description: Diamond is the NEW interactive clicker game in town! Simply click the diamond and every 15 minutes you will get a diamond with the chance of receiving one of the ultra rare coveted diamonds!

name: Chicken
description: Chicken is a clicker game, in which you click a Chicken! You click the Chicken to gain even more Chickens! Every 3 hour, random chicken drops. A community that's Chickens. All our Chickens are made with community effort and inspiration, come join the fun!

name: Fart Killer
description: "Fart Killer" is a short trash comedy game mixed with cult horror from the 80s. With totally absurd and meaningless scenes. Don't expect a super Hollywood production... It's much better than that!

name: Motorcycles: World Championship
description: Discover the exciting adventure of a young motorcycle on his journey to glory in the Wheel City Grand Championship. Accelerate with Speedy and experience speed like never before!

name: Hentai Girls: Ultra Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Premium
description: Sin descripción

name: Stop Them All
description: Control robot soldiers from an interplanetary mining company to defeat the defense system of a ruined colony. Buy soldiers, upgrade them, defeat waves of enemies.

name: Broken Tape
description: Broken Tape is a narrative-driven first person walking simulator with the elements of psychological horror. You take the role of a test subject in a secret organization. You were tasked with a job to eliminate anomalies in a series of old tapes, containing more than you might expect.

name: Super Dungeon Muncher
description: Avoid becoming Muncher's next meal in this fast-paced adventure! Control your anger, this game is hard!

name: Kimi sae Ireba: Episode Sutelz
description: The Heflitian Girl's past is about to be revealed! This is a Drama and Action Adventure with a deep story and mysteries originating from an ancient planet... Planet Earth, which was destroyed and forgotten...

name: Capital
description: A non-linear action-adventure heist game with destructible buildings, use stolen loot to buy bigger explosives and access higher value loot. Buy and customize cars. Invest in military equipment such as helicopters and tanks. Get your mansion!

name: Cubidle
description: An idle clicker game with prestige, perks, interest, evolving system, difficulty tiers, ranking and many other features!

name: City Turn
description: City Turn is a 2D single player, turn based game. The player is competing against a program (AI) in finding the same 5 images in the given order. Player can win/loose points and be hit by the objects. Buildings are stored differently for each game on loading game.

name: Karma
description: Explore the mysterious world of hell in this walking simulator. Search for six hearts while encountering strange characters and impressive landscapes. The haunting music, composed for this game, draws you deeper into the depths of hell.

name: Pixelorama
description: Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features.

name: Slap That
description: Slap almost anything blocking your way in order to go deeper and deeper and discover what is going on in this world!

name: CTGP Deluxe
description: CTGP Deluxe is a modification for Mario Kart 8 Deluxe adding in new community made tracks and quality of life changes.

name: Merge Mango
description: Mango is a delightful game where you merge Mangoes! Every 3 and 18 hours, receive a surprise Mango to grow your vibrant collection. Can you gather them all?

name: Landlord and the Tenants
description: In Landlord and the Tenants, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Sharing Ending) or a sad ending (NTR Ending) depending on how you play.

name: Jazz Out
description: Jazz Out is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS platformer where you use your enemies as your platforms! You'll punch and uppercut your enemies, make them fly, and teleport on top of them to keep up your combo. Bust out from the prison, perfect your escape by playing again and again!

name: Old School Tower Defense
description: Build and upgrade towers with unique abilities to stop waves of enemies. With the advanced augment system, every 3 rounds you can boost your defenses and create strategies that fit your playstyle.

name: Bedtime Stories 1
description: BEDTIME STORIES 1This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Kemopop!
description: Fast puzzles, cute boys~! A food-themed physics puzzler where you undress your waiter. A kemono game, by kemono artists.

name: Age of Defense: Prehistory
description: The most addicting tower defense game, packed with monsters and tough defenders, all of which fit perfectly into the cartoonish environment. Prehistory is a prologue for the main story Age of Defense.

name: Savior Quest
description: "Savior Quest" is an ARPG with a behind the scenes perspective. By taking missions in the main city and challenging various powerful boss, players can obtain random equipment with various entries.

name: Prism Break
description: Prism Break - a challenging and ever changing adventure through a colourful geometric world! Can you break out?

name: One Long Night with the Circleheads
description: It's the worst storm in years. You're on the run and must seek shelter in a nearby shed. Little do you know that the sphere-headed beings that inhabit it have FUNFUNFUN plans for you... Can you survive One Long Night with the Circleheads?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Las Vegas
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Las Vegas landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Mario's Carnival Quest
description: Mario’s Carnival Quest is a mod of Mario Party Advance to give the game a more fitting title, with a few quality of life tweaks added on top!

name: Dimensional Phobos Threat
description: Dimensional Phobos Threat You are trapped in a cursed place in this horror investigation game for 1 to 4 players that you can play with your friends. The only way to lift the curse is to search the place and find and destroy the cursed items according to the clues

name: Dead Zone Defense
description: Destroy hordes of zombies in the company of friends or alone.In this dynamic shooter with a top view, you have to build a base, come up with strategies, improve your weapons and buildings. There is only one goal - to destroy them all.

name: Break Games
description: In need of a small break while streaming? Launch a break game and let your community defend your stream from an alien invasion or get them riled up with an exclusive giveaway game! Break Games offer fun games to engage your community while you are on a short break!

name: Bump in the Night
description: You are trapped in a terrible dream. Observe your surroundings carefully and discern whether you are truly in your own home, or if you are experiencing a waking nightmare.

name: Jugs Bay
description: Prepare for sexy adventure in Jugs Bay, a captivating visual novel full of engaging encounters and vibrant characters. Play as a likable young man exploring a new world full of opportunities, hot encounters and romance.

name: Wizard Pulse
description: Wizard Pulse is a casual shooter game about wizards. Shoot through hordes of enemies and unlock new abilities.

name: Cowboys vs. Monsters
description: The local miners have accidentally opened up the gates of Hell, now you have to put together a posse to drive those monsters back. Cowboys vs. Monsters is a cute tower defense game with Roguelite elements.

name: Fae Line
description: Make a line and prepare to fight! Absorb energy, make new pixies and expand your line of pixies at max to conquer every enemy possible! And don't forget to make them kneel before your power, or maybe you want to kneel for them?

name: Fresh Milk For Mars
description: A cute puzzle game in which you have to catch cows and bring them back to Mars.

name: Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle
description: Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle is a thrilling journey from a small-time gangster to the revered Godfather of Hollywood, Las Vegas, and Chicago in the Prohibition Era!

name: Bad Mechanic
description: Bad Mechanic is a tower-defense action roguelike. Plan (and improvise) your defenses against a swarm of weird little guys. Dodge your own towers' attacks as you collect loot. Build a unique arsenal of towers and items in each run that will kill you in spectacular fashion.

name: Ant Keeping Simulator
description: Grow, feed and care for your colony of mighty ants in a realistic semi-idle simulation of ant keeping. Created in collaboration with ant keeping enthusiasts, Ant Keeping Simulator will be an accurate experience to ant keepers.

name: Stretcher Men
description: "Stretcher Men" is an action game where you transport a patient on a stretcher. Control characters at the front and back, avoiding obstacles to safely reach the clinic. Simple yet deep gameplay tests your attention and coordination.

name: Pixel Car Racing: Blocky Crash
description: Incredibly addictive, dynamic blocky cars that give you a lot of positive emotions! In Pixel Car Racer you have to take part in a breathtaking racer car game where you have to rush along a track full of secrets, obstacles, bonuses, jumps and finish first.

name: Hadarot
description: Defend against Gods and mythological creatures with your cards in this unique cards game. Modify your deck as your adventure goes on to kill the God that gave you life and your cards.

name: Recoil Cluck
description: Recoil Cluck is a dungeon adventure game featuring a little yellow chick as the protagonist.

name: 30 Days of Tower
description: By managing your tower during the day you prepare yourself for the dangers of the night, the king depends on you to dominate this territory. Will you be able to survive 30 days in this distant land?

name: Xetanon
description: Xetanon is a short puzzle game, where you are testing the soon to be released Electricity 3.0.

name: My Life As An Alchemist
description: The first survivor-like game without any enemies! Choose up to three potions to craft per wave, swiftly gather the required ingredients within a limited time, then craft the best potions to enhance your stats in various ways! Research and unlock new elements to expand your alchemical arsenal!

name: Temple Crawler
description: A tactical roguelike dungeon crawler, featuring an intuitive yet deep core mechanic. Acquire powerful artifacts to forge your path through dungeons filled with ruthless enemies and dangerous traps. Embark on this epic adventure and fulfill your quest for glory!

name: 8th Heaven
description: Reborn on an island paradise filled with fantastical monster-people, live your brand new day-to-day life making friends and indulging in erotic intimacy!

name: Castle Guardian
description: Legendary action with tower defense warfare! Become a castle guard in fantastic medieval era! Destroy the enemies with your wingman Centaur. Defend your castle!

name: Deathless
description: Deathless - a cooperative Action Roguelite game. Battle with friends against endless waves of enemies! Intense fights and tough choices await as each minute decides your fate. Unleash unique abilities and strategies!

name: Gorgon Shield
description: Gather your party of expendable heroes. Climb a vast tower atop a shiny shield. Who will fight? Who will heal? Who will laze around and take all the treasure. The choices will be yours alone, but only those who work together will reach the top of the Tower Shield.

name: Cats on Duty
description: Cats on Duty is a purr-fect blend of RTS, tower defense and match-3 mechanics. Manage two game fields at once, arm and upgrade your cat towers to defeat hordes of formidable foes. Enjoy the meow-nificent battle!

name: Towerful Defense: A Rogue TD
description: Towerful Defense: A Rogue TD is a roguelike tower defense game. You have one tower and a few skills that you must use wisely to fight off waves of ever-growing enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades, and items to craft your unique and powerful builds.

name: Grim-World: Survival
description: Grim World is a survival and adventure game in which you can build your home, create your character and shape it to your liking . You can become a warrior, a hunter or even a magician. You may well be halfway between a hunter and a magic like you want

name: Dread Weight
description: You are being hunted by the ancient witch Baba Yaga. Can you make the right decisions to survive? Or will spirits overtake the mansion?

name: Raiders of Valhalla
description: Manage an army of Viking dwarves and lead them to victory! Give them new weapons and armor, choose a village to raid, and watch them destroy everything, get stronger and do it all over again! How far can you go?

name: Elixir
description: Welcome to Elixir, a 2D strategic puzzle experience. Become an ancient alchemist with a mysterious past to unlock. Explore & find lost souls who need your help. Uncover Elixirs and experiment on them, and yourself. Embark on a dark journey to solve puzzles, unlock recipes and unearth hidden secrets.

name: Kinetic Storm
description: Defeat waves of enemies in this action-packed twin stick shooter. After every wave upgrade your ship to customize your build.

name: Ogu and the Secret Forest
description: Explore the wonderful world with baby Ogu! 'Ogu and the Secret Forest' is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and various types of puzzles. Befriend bouncy characters and defeat strange creatures to unravel the mystery of the charming world.

name: M.O.O.D.S.
description: M.O.O.D.S. is a Roguelite shooter with Robots fighting using the powers of Emotions. Blast crazy mechs with a myriad of Weapon x Addins combinations. Talk to Bosses to change their combat style. Change your Basic Skills with dozens upgrades. Play solo or with friends!

name: Haters
description: Dive into the stylized world of HATERS to release hate into other players with third-person shooter combat. Unlock hate weapons get back those players that buy skins. Enjoy 4 different modes alone or with friends. Download for free today and build your hate.

name: Age of Defense
description: AoD is tower defense game with some new features.

name: Sonic Adventure Blast 2
description:
Sonic Adventure Blast 2 allows you to play as Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles in Adventure style gameplay.

Blast through over 80 missions as you explore both classic and brand new levels.

name: Escape From Exit 7 of the Theater
description: You're stuck in an infinite loop in the theater. You must escape to exit 7 to open the hidden door. Go forward and find the hidden door.

name: Paper Protocol
description: Paper Protocol is a Tower Defense game with elements of Real Time Strategy. Command a versatile mech and a squad of high tech turrets to defend the Paper Co. building from angry trees! Upgrade both yourself and your turrets to defend against the trees and their unique abilities.

name: Looped: Love at first sight
description: Looped is a short interactive story told through hand-drawn animation. Guide Him and Her through the chapters of their story by solving peaceful mini-puzzles and find a way out of the

name: Click the Chick
description: The chick hungers for the click! Are you ready to click it and be the clicker of the chick?! Chirp, Chirp, Chirp!

name: Sky's The Limit: Mah-jong
description: A roguelike deck-building Riichi Mahjong game. Utilize tile trading, special tiles, and status enhancement to build your own deck and aim for an eight consecutive wins (Pa-Ren-Chan)! And then, reach even greater heights!

name: Turte
description: Turte is a simple yet engaging game where players click on a turtle to increase their score. With straightforward mechanics and an easy-to-understand interface, Turte offers an enjoyable experience for players of all ages.

name: Top-G: Battle of The Matrix
description: Experience the intense action of a Romanian Mafia Boss in this gripping action-adventure game. Fight the government, police, and elites after being stripped of all your power and wealth. Sail the seas, drive through mountains, fly in the sky, and break into top-secret labs to beat the Matrix.

name: Chuxie
description: 除邪(CHUXIE) is a surreal first person horror shooting game developed using Unreal Engine 5. With the powerful capabilities of Unreal Engine 5, players will experience stunning realistic visual effects, smooth game controls, and intense battles with terrifying monsters.

name: Get Out
description: Get Out is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror. Complete tasks and puzzles to banish the entities that have you and your team trapped, and make sure to get out, before they get you.

name: Spleef Game
description: Dig the blocks below the opposing player to make him fall... But don't fall yourself! As competitive as fun!

name: Humanoid
description: Embark on a heart-pounding journey in this survival open-world game, where a relentless creature, Humanoids prowls the landscape. Explore, craft, build, and fight for your life as you navigate the dangerous world.

name: Little Army
description: Little Army is an auto battle game in which powerful insect rulers clash for power. Each faction has its own specific abilities and effects in battle, and the Tyrants provide different aids to their armies. Expand your ranks and crush your enemies.

name: Scripted Land
description: Code your territory's AI to make it prosper! Manage production and processing, strengthen your adventurers and let them explore! Can you prevent enemy invasion and win the war? This is a hex-based 2D game where you register Lua scripts as your lords and manage your territory.

name: WooLoop: Flags Pack
description: This Flags-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Flags from around the world!

name: Magical Boco
description:
When you hit a star on an enemy, a fruit will appear. If you take a fruit, you get a score.
When you touch an enemy, your POWER will decrease.
When the power reaches 0, the game is over.

name: Young Detectives: Space
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Young Detectives: Farm
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Young Detectives: School
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Whiskers
description: This game places you against a pristine white backdrop

name: Russian Random Speedmap Pack 3
description: Russian Random Speedmapping Sessions is a speedmapping festival, where the goal was not a timer, but high-quality maps realized in a short time, the development of which would not go into endless construction. The result was 25 mappers have come together to create 64 maps with unique gameplay, ideas and experiments.

name: Magman
description: the new foddian on the block

name: Ghost Story
description: This game transports you into a charming pixel town brimming with retro appeal.

name: Boundary Master
description: In this game, you will step onto a desert land scorched by the scorching sun

name: Meteo Planet
description:
Meteo Planet is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to collect as many coins as you can without getting caught by a meteorite. Avoid meteorites while rotating around the planet's axis. The closer the coin is to the meteorite, the more points it brings, but be careful not to get hit by the meteorite itself.

name: Fly Fly
description: Fly Fly is an endless game where players take flight as an eagle, collecting feathers while navigating through randomly generated hoops at varying distances.

name: Patter
description: Pattern-matching game using only the mouse. Made by Stuffed Wombat and Gaziter.

name: Lots of Cats in Every Moment: The Whereabouts of the Photo
description: “Lots of Cats in Every Moment: The Whereabouts of the Photo” is an expansion pack that contains the latter part of the story from the base game.

name: Lots of Cats in Every Moment
description: “Lots of Cats in Every Moment” is a game where you find hidden cats while romance unfolds!

name: Jefe, La Cuenta
description: Sisebuto has a problem. He likes to drink a lot and pay very little. And today, the trip home is going to be fun. Everything is going to go from bad to worse.

name: Shy Guy Surfing
description:
Slide, jump, and float over the ocean in this arcade-style fangame by LucasPucas. With over a dozen unique areas, rip-roaring rival battles, and a brand-new New Game Plus mode, the world of Shy Guy Surfing is packed with content like never before!
Travel across the wild seascape and face off against bosses in Journey Mode, or shoot for a high score in Endurance Mode.
Jam to classic music from the Mario series and more, arranged by an all-star cast of chiptune artists!
Customize your experience with a wide selection of screen borders and unlockable costumes.

name: Hayato's Journey
description:
Hayato's Journey is a SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis homebrew game that works like an unofficial spiritual sucessor of Kenseiden, a cult-classic SEGA Master System game.

Hayato's Journey is the first full SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis game powered by the Scorpion Engine by earok.

name: The House of Da Vinci Complete Bundle
description: Save money and purchase the whole The House of Da Vinci 3D adventure trilogy.

name: Cooking Arena Pastry Chef
description: Sin descripción

name: Basketball Anime Girls
description: Dive into a world where basketball and anime collide, offering a fresh and engaging experience for all players.

name: Baking Time: Fast Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Color Water Sort: Relax Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: My Horse Stories: Classy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ice!
description: ICE! is a match game of iceCube collecting. Buy, sell, or risk it all... the choice is yours.

name: Young Detectives: Undersea
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Five-element Seal: Infinity
description: Representing the world of hell; A world that can shuttle through space, a world that can rotate continents... In the future, there will be more worlds and levels waiting to be explored, representing a world of creation where one can create their own world

name: Urban Survival Simulator: The Bum's Journey
description: Do you have what it takes to adapt, survive and become an urban legend?

name: Inflatables
description: Time to bounce!

name: Thief Simulator: Heist Master
description: Are you ready to embrace the life of a master thief?

name: The Feast of Madness: A Night of Drowning in Forbidden Temptation
description: [New Genre of Horror × Erotica: Escape from the Mad Women!]You stop by a mansion to be invited for a free dinner. Once inside, you are taken by magic somewhere dark. If caught, you will be beaten, ××, and forced to submit. Solve the mysteries and escape the mansion.

name: Tetrack
description: One simple but hard rule here - you must react very quickly to constantly changing conditions, tasks and speed. A challenge for real players with exceptional skills!

name: Curse of Dares
description: Frau and her friends talk about how they could not stay the night in a haunted house. Frau doesn't believe in ghosts, so she said she would spend the night alone at an abandoned school nearby to prove that ghosts don't exist.

name: SymbioPhobia
description: SymbioPhobiA is a short survival horror game, mainly from an isometric perspective that mixes action, exploration, puzzles and platforming that takes place in a futuristic and post-apocalyptic bunker that has an oppressive and claustrophobic atmosphere.

name: Whisper Of The Curse
description: "Whisper of the Curse" is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game where you and your team will perform various rituals and spells to eliminate the curse and fend off cursed entities. At the same time, you'll need to avoid being hunted by these malevolent entities.

name: Little Scavenger
description: Fight, explore, die in a kingdom of corrupted robot. Grow stronger by finding armor, using trinkets and rescuing npcs to increase your fighting chance. Find out the secrets of the world , the reasons for the spread of the corruption and why you are immune.

name: No Creeps Were Harmed TD
description: Employ lethal turrets, traps, and gadgets to defend against an onslaught of evolving creeps! Step into a twisted, hyper 3D, mind bending realm. Upgrade and adapt your defenses. Become a master maze crafter. Collect bizarre artifacts. Rush creeps for lucrative rewards, and succumb to greed!

name: It Was a Human
description: A short SF psychedelic interrogation ADV game that focuses on the interrogation of a suspect in a dismemberment murder case. The protagonist is a lieutenant colonel, tasked with interrogating the suspect. The protagonist needs to find out why she killed the two men and how she committed the crime.

name: Ariel
description:
Intense survival experience based on a Sci-Fi, space terror script. Unravel the story of Ferdinand Ludec as he attempts to escape his fortune. Partially procedural world along with different endings to the story. Hunger, avoiding insanity and extreme weather will only be some of the threats to face.

Ariel - There is no way out -

name: Five Nights At Amendoca's
description: Five Nights At Amendoca's (or FNAA) is a Five Nights At Freddy's fangame created by furry productions inspired by the Amendo Gordo channel, the most scoundrel channel on YouTube

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: Style Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Zoo: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Brother
description: "lost brother" is a short retro PSX-style indie horror game.

name: Subway Sandwichdle
description: A daily guessing game where players aim to guess the mystery sandwich from the Subway menu. Each incorrect guess reveals information about the ingredients used to make the sandwich.

name: Select Oblige
description: Select Oblige is the latest title from the popular Japanese visual novel brand Madosoft. It features character design and artwork by renowned illustrator Hiyo Yuzuna, with the story crafted by Shoukei Wakaba. The main heroines are voiced by Hana Akino, Kanau, Ren Sagami, and Yuuka Nanakusa.

name: Karpe Diem
description:
It's that time of year again... Karpe Diem!

The famous festival of the Joisey region which brings travelers from far and wide to compete in a fishing competition overseen by the widely adored Mayor Slowpoke. Set out on adventure to become the next Karpe Diem champion, face off against a worthy rival, meet helpful strangers, and solve thematic puzzles.

This fan-made Pokemon slice of life game strips out longtime series mechanics such as battling, badges, and evolutions to instead focus on things like kicking back, relaxing, and reeling in a whopper.

name: Drift Legacy: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Idle Adventure
description:
The Seven Deadly Sins reborn as cute chibis!
The characters from "The Seven Deadly Sins" have been turned into lovable little chibis! But they haven't gotten any weaker!

name: Artifact Seeker: DLC 1 - The Legacy of Mortia
description: New characters, new maps, new boss, new Synergy, new artifacts, new events, and many more new contents await everyone’s exploration!
